unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Brand Collaborations Heat Up!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Brand Collaborations Heat Up!**

unnormalised: Yo, influencer marketing is BOOMING! Seems like everyone's teaming up these days, right? Brand collabs are the new biryani – everyone wants a piece.
normalised: Yo, influencer marketing is booming! Seems like everyone's teaming up these days, right? Brand collabs are the new biryani – everyone wants a piece.

unnormalised: This week, we saw fashion designer Masaba Gupta drop a limited-edition saree collection with D'Mart. Talk about unexpected! Apparently, it’s flying off the shelves faster than you can say "discount."
normalised: This week, we saw fashion designer Masaba Gupta drop a limited-edition saree collection with D Mart. Talk about unexpected! Apparently, it’s flying off the shelves faster than you can say "discount."

unnormalised: Then there's Neha Kakkar promoting a new line of speakers from Boat. That earworm of a jingle is stuck in our heads, tbh. Smart move targeting her 70 million+ Insta followers.
normalised: Then there's Neha Kakkar promoting a new line of speakers from Boat. That earworm of a jingle is stuck in our heads, to be honest. Smart move targeting her seventy million plus Insta followers.

unnormalised: And hold up, did you see Chennai-based chef Sanjeev Kapoor partnering with a spice brand for Onam recipes? Festive feels AND flavor!
normalised: And hold up, did you see Chennai-based chef Sanjeev Kapoor partnering with a spice brand for Onam recipes? Festive feels and flavor!

unnormalised: Analysts are saying these collaborations are key to reaching new audiences, especially in Tier 2 & 3 cities. Forget traditional ads, this is where the action's at. Are we going to see more of these types of collaborative efforts?
normalised: Analysts are saying these collaborations are key to reaching new audiences, especially in Tier two and three cities. Forget traditional ads, this is where the action's at. Are we going to see more of these types of collaborative efforts?

unnormalised: Even smaller brands are getting in on the action, partnering with micro-influencers to boost engagement. Smart strategies, everyone is collaborating to increase sales volume. Looks like the brand collaboration trend is here to stay, folks!
normalised: Even smaller brands are getting in on the action, partnering with micro-influencers to boost engagement. Smart strategies, everyone is collaborating to increase sales volume. Looks like the brand collaboration trend is here to stay, folks!
